borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">By reason of the cumulative impact of the additions to the dwellinghouse, in addition to their significant scale, bulk and massing,&nbsp;</span><font face="PT Sans, sans-serif"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt;">the proposed development will further dominate the&nbsp;dwelling which will no longer reflect the character of the original&nbsp;dwellinghouse and result in harm to the appearance of the house, disrupting the&nbsp;</span>symmetry<span style="font-size: 10.5pt;">&nbsp;and balance of the&nbsp;</span>semi<span style="font-size: 10.5pt;">-detached pair, and impacting the&nbsp;</span>openness<span style="font-size: 10.5pt;">&nbsp;of the corner plot, resulting in harm to the streetscene&nbsp;and character of the area, especially noting the siting within the Becontree Estate.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></font><span style="font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;
